ai.actions

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KickAtGoalAction, LookAtBallAction, MoveToBallAction, ReturnHomeAction

    public interface Action
    Interface for all agent actions. An action holds the necessary logic to achieve a task. Created by raghavnarula on 05/11/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void takeAction(CommandPlayer player, EnvironmentModel model)
      Make the agent take an action.

    • Method Detail

      • takeAction

        void takeAction(CommandPlayer player,
                EnvironmentModel model)
        Make the agent take an action. This decision is based on the current game state.
        Parameters:
        player - Agent to make take an action.
        model - Model containing the current game state.
